name: [G.Tech 2] Pokemon: Battle to Arceus
description:
Pokemon : Battle to Arceus is a CLI-only game made from a school project in G.Tech 2, the goal of this project was to discover the C# programming language.

CONTENT

Our project was to make a Pokemon game in 14 days with the simplest features like : 

  • Movement in different maps
  • Turn-based combat
  • Catch pokemons and train them
  • Inventory & Items
  • Save system
  • Arceus as a boss battle (good luck ahah)
HOW TO PLAY
  • Arrows to move and navigate in the menus
  • Enter to select
  • Backspace to return
  • Echap to open the pause menu
